name: Country Sourdough Loaf
desc: The Classic Country Loaf is a fan favourite. This nutritious, naturally leavened sourdough is naturally sweet with a bit of earth and a touch of tang. With a soft and tender crumb, it’s an elevated take on your everyday sourdough.

name: Spearhead Oktoberfest (beer)
desc: Spearhead’s Oktoberfest Lager represents the way Bavarians celebrate Oktoberfest. It’s a 5.8% fuller-body, moderately-hopped, seasonal lager. It has a copper-red colour, great mouthfeel, and lots of flavour. Prost!
